function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited quantitative studies in biophilic design","Impact":"Difficulty in measuring the effectiveness of biophilic design on mitigating contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conduct qualitative research to complement quantitative studies, and develop new measurement criteria for non-physical elements","Technologies":"Qualitative research methods, development of new measurement tools","People":"Architecture specialists, researchers","Owner":"Architecture research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in quantifying environmental psychology factors","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the psychological impact of biophilic design on disease propagation","Mitigation":"Explore alternative approaches to measure psychological factors, such as surveys and interviews, and integrate qualitative data into assessments","Technologies":"Survey tools, interview techniques","People":"Psychologists, environmental psychologists, architects","Owner":"Research institutions, psychology organizations"},{"Description":"Limited evaluation criteria for non-physical architectural themes","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of architectural elements that may impact disease propagation","Mitigation":"Expand evaluation criteria to include non-physical architectural themes and their potential impact on contagion, develop new assessment frameworks","Technologies":"Architectural analysis tools, assessment frameworks","People":"Architects, architectural researchers","Owner":"Architectural institutions, certification organizations"}]}
